Texts.Chs: 把^orange;增强铠甲^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我需要把一个有意思的玩偶打扮成我一位^green;同事的妈妈^reset;，你能帮我做一个^orange;增强铠甲^reset;吗？我的缝纫能力太差了，为此我会付钱给你，嘘，别声张，我希望这是我们之间的小秘密。
Texts.Eng: I need to dress a pleasure doll to look exactly like ^green;a coworkers mother^reset;... Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? I suck at sewing, and I'll pay you. Shh!

Texts.Chs: 哈哈，步骤二已完成！还有，谢谢你的帮忙！他永远都猜不到是我！
Texts.Eng: Now for phase two! Thanks for the help. He'll never see it coming!
